thread.title: One Direction think their Justin Bieber chart battle is "good for pop culture" - Music
thread.title_full: One Direction think their Justin Bieber chart battle is "good for pop culture" - Music News - Digital Spy

author: Amy Davidson
title: One Direction think their Justin Bieber chart battle is "good for pop culture" - Music
text: It was handbags at dawn last week when Justin Bieber accused One Direction of hijacking his album launch for publicity.The group have now acknowledged their shared release date with the singer, and said it's no bad thing. "It's gonna be a good little battle, it's good for pop culture," Niall Horan told Clyde 1 Radio.Louis Tomlinson chipped in to comment on Bieber's alleged mocking of One Direction on Snapchat, insisting: "We mocked him back. It's all just a bit of a laugh and a joke.""Let's have it," he added. Justin Bieber's Purpose and One Direction's Made in the AM are both released on November 13.Watch the music video for One Direction's 'Drag Me Down' below:
